caption:
This photograph captures an environmental scene dominated by pollution in a water body. In the foreground, a man in work attire, wearing a cap and a blue checkered shirt with suspenders, stands on a muddy shore. He uses a long pole to rake or skim through a shiny, oily surface of a polluted river or pond. The water reflects a dark sheen, indicating the presence of oil or chemical pollutants.

The mid-ground of the image shows the extent of the water body, dotted with rocks and further patches of slick and foam, indicating severe contamination. The background features a flat and open landscape with sparse vegetation, power lines, and distant mountains under a slightly clouded sky, suggesting an industrial or deserted rural area.

Overall, the composition of the photograph emphasizes an environmental issue, focusing on water pollution and possibly a cleanup effort, as evidenced by the man's activity and the general desolateness of the area. The setting appears bleak and neglected, underscoring the gravity of environmental degradation in the scene.
title: Pumping operation underway which removed some 1,200,000 gallons of acid water and oil from the five acre pond. The liquid was neutralized after removal and trucked to a nearby site for disposal. The pond was cleaned up under EPA supervision to prevent possible contamination of nearby Great Salt Lake and a wildlife refuge.
